level.text: Each program shall develop guidelines to assess whether a program participant:
Has the ability to self-administer his or her medications;
Requires the prescribed medication to be administered by a trainedmedication employee; or
Requires the prescribed medication to be administered by a licensed practical or registered nurse.
The program shall monitor each program participant’s ability to self-medicate as follows:

A registered nurse shall annually review the program participant’s ability to self-administer medication correctly and document the program participant’s ability to continue self-medication in the participant’s records.

A trained medication employee shall review the program participant’s ability to self-administer medication at least quarterly and document the program participant’s ability to self-administer medication as prescribed.
